prompt: A rock track with a heavily distorted electric guitar playing aggressive power chords and gritty riffs through a cranked-up amp. A solid bass guitar holds down the root notes while a live drum kit drives the beat with a steady kick and snappy snare. The tone is raw and saturated, thick with overdrive and feedback. Instrumental, no vocals.

prompt_fields.control_delta: Timbre: heavy saturated distortion on guitar
